title: Suspect identified in Ruwanwella Murder
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 42-year-old man was murdered in Panapitiya, Ruwanwella on Thursday (17).
Sri Lanka Police said a man was found inside a rubber factory in the area with stab wounds, and he succumbed to his injuries upon admission to the hospital.
A suspect has been identified in connection with the incident, Police said.
Massive Protest in Colombo; Socialist Youth protest against govt decisions
